The NAMM Foundation has designated the District as one of the nation’s 2020 Best Communities for Music Education for its demonstration of exceptionally high commitment to music education and access to music instruction for all district... img.title: A Celebration of Excellence and Distinction
img.div:
A Celebration of Excellence and Distinction
Each year, Bellport High School demonstrates pride and gratitude during the Evening of Excellence. This cherished tradition, scheduled to take place on March 24, would have celebrated the accomplishments of 44 distinguished seniors who have... img.alt: Student Musicians Attend Honor Band Symposium
img.title: Student Musicians Attend Honor Band Symposium
img.div:
Student Musicians Attend Honor Band Symposium
Bellport High School student-musicians Jack Burkhardt (clarinet), Taylor Kelly (horn) and Anthony Notartomaso (euphonium) were selected to represent the District at the 2020 New York State Band Directors Association High School Honor Band Symposium,...
